body:
# Welcome to Lighty.io 17.0.0!

## These are the highlights delivered into this release, enjoy!

## OpenDaylight 2022-09 adaptation
1. Migrate to Java 17 by @PeterSuna in #1003
2. Bump upstreams to 2022.09 by @ihrasko in #1056
3. Remove old Bierman restconf by @Tobianas in #1016
4. Replace javax with jakarta by @ihrasko in #1026

## New features
1. Implement HTTP2 lightyServerBuider by @PeterSuna in #1010
2. Opensource lighty-guice-app example by @PeterSuna in #1017
3. Introduce lighty-app-modules-config by @PeterSuna in #941
4. Add instance-identifier-patch-module to default configuration by @Tobianas in #1100 (Fix for https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/issues/533)
5. Create RNC cluster GH workflow test by @PeterSuna in #1039
6. Use publish-action inside publish-docker-helm action by @PeterSuna in #979
7. Add configuration for basic authorization to AAA by @PeterSuna in #1014
8. Use reusable workflow for ligthy app test jobs by @PeterSuna in #1035

## Achievements
1. We have CNF certification: https://www.cncf.io/certification/cnf/#logos

## Important changes
1. Replace reload4j with log4j2 by @PeterSuna in #1125

## Security fixes
1. Fix reported CVE-2020-36518 & CVE-2022-2048 issues by @PeterSuna in #1019
2. Fix reported vulnerabilities by @PeterSuna in #1025
3. Sonatype dependencies vulnerabilities by @Tobianas in #1111

## What's Changed in Details
* Update readme for lighty 17 by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/976
* Update security readme by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/977
* Remove deprecated methods by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/981
* Bump simulator to 16.0.0 by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/986
* Bump protobuf inside gnmi-proto to 3.20.1 by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/991
* Bump grpc inside gnmi-proto to 1.46.0 by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/992
* Extend expired certificates inside gNMI tests by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/995
* Bump ODL versions to latest releases by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1000
* Fix writing data into list in gNMI Simulator by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/966
* Replace deprecated JsonParser constructor and fix Json compare inside test by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1006
* Bump ODL dependencies to latest releases by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1007
* Update required maven version by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1011
* Move AAA configuration from RNC app to AAA module by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1013
* Add configuration for basic authorization to AAA by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1014
* Add test with initializing lighty controller with choice data by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1015
* Refactor LightyServerBuilder by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1018
* Fix reported CVE-2020-36518 & CVE-2022-2048 issues by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1019
* Bump jetty to 9.4.48.v20220622 by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1020
* Opensource lighty-guice-app example by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1017
* Replace javax with jakarta by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1026
* Fix deprecated Jetty method by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1027
* Bump jsonassert to 1.5.1 by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1028
* Fix typo in lighty-tests-report README by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1030
* Add guice example to code coverage aggregator by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1029
* Fix reported vulnerabilities by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1025
* Add missing README to Guice app by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1031
* Fix "InterruptedException" should not be ignored by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1034
* Move Https LightyServerBuilder to Lighty-jetty-server module by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1009
* Formatting by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1036
* Migrate to Java 17 by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1003
* Switch mockito-core dependency to mockito-inline by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1002
* Add smoke test to Https RNC app by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1038
* Implement HTTP2 lightyServerBuider by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1010
* Update TLS keys in gNMI by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1023
* Remove old Bierman restconf by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1016
* Delete LightyWebServerAdapter by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1037
* Change ODL compatibility release in documentation by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1042
* Update docs for Rfc8040 by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1040
* Use reusbale workflow for ligthy app test jobs by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1035
* Change default value for image-tag-latest by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1044
* Fix deploy documentation for RNC & RCgNMI by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1051
* Add liveness and readiness probe to RNC & RCgNMI app by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1050
* Add exec to entrypoint script by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1049
* Add resource policies to RNC & RCgNMI app by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1052
* Close RCgNMI instance in smoke tests by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1043
* Use publish-action inside publish-docker-helm action by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/979
* Remove deprecated SemVer methods from gNMI by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1045
* Bump upstreams to 2022.09 by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1056
* Fix value added to set by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1058
* Make getSemVer method static by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1057
* Add Startup probe to RNC & RCgNMI helm by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1060
* Rework getSemVer method by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1059
* Create RNC cluster GH workflow test by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1039
* Bump Opendaylight Chlorine dependencies by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1068
* Bump simulator to 16.1.0 by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1085
* Update lighty logo by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1088
* Bump opendaylight dependencies by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1090
* Update simulator version to 16.2.0 by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1093
* Bump opendaylight dependencies by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1097
* Introduce lighty-app-modules-config by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/941
* Add instance-identifier-patch-module to default configuration by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1100
* Add Swagger unit test inside RNC Module by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/944
* Fix SwaggerTest by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1102
* Remove draft path from swagger by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1070
* Add patch replace test by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1101
* bump maven plugins by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1096
* Bump third party dependencies by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1098
* Bump aaa-artifacts by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1103
* Improve YangPatchTest efficiency by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1104
* Bump odlparent to 11.0.1 by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1105
* Bump iana-if-type model revision to 2021-06-21 by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1073
* Bump spring-boot by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1109
* Sonatype dependencies vulnerabilities by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1111
* Bump testng to 7.6.1 by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1112
* Align maven-gpg-plugin versions by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1113
* Remove unnecessary dependency overrides by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1114
* Fix SonnarCloud quality gate by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1115
* Bump slf4j-reload4j to 2.0.0  by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1120
* Remove thread sleeps from tests by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1119
* Reduce code duplicates in topology plugins by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1121
* Eliminate log4j.properties files by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1122
* Move loggers dependencies to lighty-parent by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1124
* Replace reload4j with log4j2 by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1125
* Add documentation for JMX Logger extension by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1127
* Close TopologyManager in NetconfClusteredTopologyPlugin by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1130
* Add synchronous module shutdown by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1129
* Remove unnecessary log4j2 path argument  by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1126
* Fix typo in application README by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1132
* Drop support for version 15 by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1134
* Shutdown Lighty.io modules with synchronous shutdown by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1138
* Prepare release 17.0.0 by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1062
* Add log4j2-config to distribution management by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1140
* Add log4j2-config release information by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1142


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/compare/16.0.0...17.0.0

## What's Changed
* Fix reported vulnerabilities (Cherry-pick #1025) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1032
* Fix typo in lighty-tests-report README (Cherry-pick #1030) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1033
* Change ODL compatibility release in documentation by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1041
* 16.x: Add liveness and readiness probe to RNC & RCgNMI app by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1053
* Add exec to entrypoint script by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1054
* Add resource policies to RNC & RCgNMI app by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1055
* 16.x Bump opendaylight dependencies by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1064
* Fix indirect usage of optional by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1069
* Bump ODL upstreams by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1072
* Bump simulator to 16.1.0 by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1086
* Update lighty logo (Cherry-pick #1088) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1089
* Align maven-gpg-plugin versions by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1091


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/compare/16.1.0...16.2.0

## What's Changed
* Bump Netconf to 3.0.6 by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1077

* Add exec to entrypoint script (Cherry-pick #1049) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1075
* Add resource policies to RNC & RCgNMI app (Cherry-pick #1052) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1074
* Fix indirect usage of optional (Cherry-pick #1069) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1082


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/compare/16.1.0...16.1.1

## What's Changed
* Update security readme by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/978
* Bump grpc inside gnmi-proto to 1.46.0 (Cherry-pick #992) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/994
* Bump protobuf inside gnmi-proto to 3.20.1 (Cherry-pick #991)  by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/993
* Extend expired certificates inside gNMI tests (Cherry-pick #995) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/996
* Bump ODL versions to latest Sulfur releases by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/998
* Bump ODL dependencies to latest releases (Cherry-pick #1007) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1008

* Bump simulator to 16.0.0 by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/1022


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/compare/16.0.0...16.1.0

## What's Changed
* Add mTLS and swagger support via configuration capability by @sezerb in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/937
* Fix not started JUnit test in gNMI by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/956
* Bump JUnit 5 to 5.8.2 by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/960
* Use JUnit5 Bom inside dependency-versions - 15.2.x by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/963
* Bump spring-boot to 2.5.12 by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/957
* Remove log4j2 version overrides by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/958
* Provide module shards Config instead of tmp file (Cherry-pick #952) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/970
* Support multiple top elements in initial data (Cherry-pick #951) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/968
* Deprecate MetricProvider and CacheProvider by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/972
* Bump netconf-simulator to latest release inside docker by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/984
* Bump upstream versions to Phosphorus SR3 by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/982
* Bump upstream versions to the latest Phosphorus SR3 release by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/988
* Bump protobuf inside gnmi-proto to 3.20.1 (Cherry-pick  #991) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/990
* Bump grpc inside gnmi-proto to 1.46.0 (Cherry-pick #992) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/989
* Extend expired certificates inside gNMI tests (Cherry-pick #995) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/997

## New Contributors
* @sezerb made their first contribution in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/937

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/compare/15.2.0...15.3.0

## What's Changed
* Add mandatory field to initial JSON data inside gNMI example - master by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/834
* Remove data store preparing request from gnmi - master by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/833
* Bump springboot dependencies to 2.5.6 for spring DI by @vainyksi in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/846
* Add maven profile to collect & list all licenses for dependencies used by @vainyksi in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/847
* Add binding action registration example by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/808
* Add option for loading yang models from classpath in gNMI simulator - master by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/842
* Introduce BGP lighty module + app by @marekzatko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/855
* Add base lift configuration by @vainyksi in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/858
* Update k8s and helm versions inside RNC & RCgNMI apps to the latest - Master by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/867
* Add option to Load yang models from class path inside gNMI SB - Master by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/856
* Workaround fix for Openconfig regex pattern matching problem - Master by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/857
* Add basic BGP module tests by @marekzatko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/862
* Allow BGP app to start with lighty .json config + READMEs by @marekzatko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/871
* Add missing BGP topo models by @marekzatko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/872
* Upgrade and unify usage of lighty-codecs-util by @marekzatko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/863
* Remove deprecated methods from lighty-codecs-util by @marekzatko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/879
* Bump OpenDaylight netconf to 2.0.11 & fix logs bug - Master by @guillaumelambert in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/890
* Removed unused dependencies by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/869
* Update copyrights in opensourced repositories by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/883
* Replace SchemaPath with SchemaInference by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/905
* Upgrading lift configuration to remove problematic tooling (cherry-pick #907) by @vainyksi in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/909
* Fix reported Snkyk issues - master by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/908
* Replace slf4j-log4j12 with slf4j-reload4j by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/914
* Bump to Phosphorus SR2 - master by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/924
* Fix lighty-controller-spring-di test - master by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/922
* Fix lighty spring boot log4j vulnerabilities - master by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/923
* Create SECURITY.md by @mmiklus in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/920
* Set Alpine version inside docker to 3.15.0 - master by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/929
* Fix closing lighty apps and add option to increase time-out - Master by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/886
* Uncomment tests for restconf/operations after fix in upstream by @Tobianas in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/877
* Update tests in RNC/RCGNMI apps by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/933
* Add module time-out to RNC & RCgNMI helm charts by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/935
* Lift config update by @vainyksi in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/939
* Add mTLS and swagger support via configuration capability (cherry-pick #937) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/942
* Fix not started JUnit test in gNMI by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/949
* Bump upstream dependencies by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/950
* Bump spring-boot to 2.5.12 by @rovarga in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/946
* Provide module shards Config to Controller instead of tmp file by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/952
* Remove log4j2 version overrides by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/955
* Bump JUnit 5 to 5.8.2 by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/959
* Use JUnit5 Bom inside dependency-versions by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/964
* Create Inference directly from YangInstanceIdentifier by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/961
* Bump to latest released ODL Sulfur versions by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/962
* Mark confusing methods deprecated by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/965
* Support multiple top elements in initial data by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/951
* Clean-up in lighty JSON configuration by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/945
* Bump to new released Sulfur versions by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/967
* Prepare separate RNC/RCgNMI deploy actions by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/943
* Bump third-party dependencies by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/973

## New Contributors
* @Tobianas made their first contribution in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/869

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/compare/15.0.0...16.0.0

## What's Changed
* Add base lift configuration (cherry-pick #858) by @vainyksi in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/859
* Add option to Load yang models from class path inside gNMI SB (cherry-pick #856) by @vainyksi in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/875
* Workaround fix for Openconfig regex pattern matching problem - (cherry-pick #857) by @vainyksi in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/876
* Upgrade and unify usage of lighty-codecs-util (cherry-pick #863) by @marekzatko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/878
* Bump OpenDaylight netconf & fix logs bug by @guillaumelambert in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/889
* Removed unused dependencies (cherry-pick #869) by @vainyksi in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/893
* Update copyrights in opensourced repositories (cherry-pick #883) by @vainyksi in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/894
* Upgrading lift configuration to remove problematic tooling (cherry-pick #906) by @vainyksi in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/910
* Fix reported Snkyk issues - (cherry-pick #908) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/925
* Replace slf4j-log4j12 with slf4j-reload4j (cherry-pick  #914) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/926
* Fix lighty-controller-spring-di test (cherry-pick #922) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/927
* Fix lighty spring boot log4j vulnerabilities (cherry-pick #923) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/928
* Set Alpine version inside docker to 3.15.0 (cherry-pick #929) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/930
* Fix closing lighty apps and add option to increase time-out (cherry-pick #886) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/931
* Uncomment tests for restconf/operations after fix in upstream (cherry-pick #877) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/932
* Add module time-out to RNC & RCgNMI helm charts (cherry-pick #935) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/936
* Prepare release 15.2.0 by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/915
    * Update upstream dependencies to Phosphorus SR2 release versions:
        - odlparent - 9.0.13
        - aaa - 0.14.10
        - controller - 4.0.10
        - infrautils - 2.0.13
        - mdsal - 8.0.12
        - netconf - 2.0.14
        - yangtools - 7.0.14
* ODL fixes:
    - Leaf Node cannot be deleted inside NETCONF device via RESTCONF (https://jira.opendaylight.org/browse/NETCONF-833)


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/compare/15.1.0...15.2.0

## What's Changed
* Upgrading lift configuration to remove problematic tooling (cherry-pick #910) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/919
* Removed unused dependencies (cherry-pick #893) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/916
* Replace slf4j-log4j12 with slf4j-reload4j (cherry-pick #914) + Resolve rest of logging vulnerabilities by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/917
* Prepare release 14.4.0 by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/918
    * Update upstream dependencies to Silicon SR4 release versions:
        -  odlparent - 8.1.9
        -  aaa - 0.13.11
        -  controller - 3.0.16
        -  infrautils - 1.9.15
        -  mdsal - 7.0.14
        -  netconf - 1.13.8
        -  yangtools - 6.0.12
        -  openflowplugin - 0.12.4
        -  serviceutils - 0.7.4


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/compare/14.3.0...14.4.0

## What's Changed
* Add mandatory field to initial JSON data inside gNMI example (cherry-pick #834) by @vainyksi in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/840
* Remove data store prepare request from gnmi (cherry-pick #833) by @vainyksi in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/845
* Bump springboot dependencies to 2.5.6 for spring DI (cherry-pick #846) by @vainyksi in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/852
* Add maven profile to collect & list all licenses for dependencies used (cherry-pick #847) by @vainyksi in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/853
* Add binding action registration example (cherry-pick #808) by @ihrasko in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/841
* Add option for loading yang models from classpath in gNMI simulator (cherry-pick #842) by @vainyksi in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/854
* Prepare release 15.1.0 by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/850
  * Update upstream dependencies to Phosphorus SR1 release versions:
    -  odlparent 9.0.8
    -  aaa-artifacts 0.14.7
    -  controller-artifacts 4.0.7
    -  bundle-parent 4.0.7
    -  infrautils-artifacts 2.0.8
    -  mdsal-artifacts 8.0.7
    -  netconf-artifacts 2.0.9
    -  yangtools-artifacts 7.0.9
    -  yang-maven-plugin 7.0.9
    -  mdsal-binding-java-api-generator 8.0.7
    -  checkstyle 9.0.8


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/compare/15.0.0...15.1.0

## What's Changed
* Bump netconf-simulator for k8s tests by @vainyksi in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/820
* Fix critical code smell reported by SonnarCloud - 14.2.x (cherry-pick #818) by @vainyksi in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/823

* Create module for generating overall lighty test coverage - 14.2.x (cherry-pick #822) by @vainyksi in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/827
* Remove unused kubernetes client dependency - 14.2.x (cherry-pick #825) by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/828
* Add quick start gNMI/RESTCONF example app - 14.2.x by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/752
* Remove data store prepare request from gnmi (cherry-pick #833 to 14.2.x) by @vainyksi in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/844
* Prepare release 14.3.0 by @PeterSuna in https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/pull/860
  * Update upstream dependencies to Silicon SR3 release versions:
    -  odlparent 8.1.4
    -  aaa-artifacts 0.13.7

    -  bundle-parent 3.0.12
    -  infrautils-artifacts 1.9.10
    -  mdsal-artifacts 7.0.10
    -  netconf-artifacts 1.13.5
    -  yangtools-artifacts 6.0.8

    - serviceutils-artifacts 0.7.3
    -  yang-maven-plugin 6.0.8
    -  mdsal-binding-java-api-generator 7.0.10
    -  checkstyle 8.1.4


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/PANTHEONtech/lighty/compare/14.2.1...14.3.0

- Adopt Phosphorus to upstream
    -  odlparent 9.0.6
    -  aaa-artifacts 0.14.3
    -  controller-artifacts 4.0.3
    -  bundle-parent 4.0.3
    -  infrautils-artifacts 2.0.6
    -  mdsal-artifacts 8.0.5
    -  netconf-artifacts 2.0.5
    -  yangtools-artifacts 7.0.8
    -  yang-maven-plugin 7.0.8
    -  mdsal-binding-java-api-generator 8.0.5
    -  checkstyle 9.0.6
- Introduce gNMI module to lighty with simulator
    - Enforce JSON_IETF [RFC7951] encoding support in lighty-gnmi
    - Introduce docker+helm for RCgNMI application
    - Convert sonic_gnoi protofile to YANG
    - Implement sonic_gnoi gRPCs in simulator
    - Introduce gNMI force capability - to overwrite the used capabilities for gNMI device
- Add gNMI/RESTCONF quick start example
- Remove lighty-codes and lighty-community-netconf-quarkus-app
- Remove openflow plugin
- Introduce ModuleStartupException for reporting Modules startup failiers
- Create lighty module for generating aggregate coverage
- Bump netconf-simulator for k8s tests to latest
- Add ActionProviderService and ActionService to LightyServices
- Remove references to obsolete models
- Rework GitHub workflow for testing the lighty application
- Make modules information inputs configurable in the publish workflow
- Extract AAAEncryptionServiceImpl to standalone module
- Fix sonarcloud reported vulnerabilities, codesmells & security issues
- Add postman collection to RNC app
- Bump akka config to 2.6
- Update lighty clustering
- Remove clustering example application
- Refactor JsonNodeConverter to use parameterized JSONCodecFactorySupplier

Release notes:
- Fix version of few project modules not managed by maven and in scripts & docs
- Fix occasional non-logical failures in gNMI tests
- Update openconfig models in gNMI IT tests
- Refactor docker-image & helm-charts deploy workflow to be more generic

Release notes:
- Add verification to lighty-examples which checks if the applications/modules have started correctly
- Refactor akka version handling in poms

- Refactor JsonNodeConverter to use parameterized JSONCodecFactorySupplier

     - Reimplement UnreachableListener as MemberRemovedListener

     - Add option to set Split brain resolver strategy in lighty-application's helm chart
     - Remove lighty-cluster-app example 
 - gNMI:
    - Introduce lighty-gnmi-sb module
    - Introduce lighty-gnmi-device-simulator

Release notes:
- Migrate from travis to GH actions
     * uploading & storing built artifacts in GH
     * easier integration for forked repositories with GH actions & SonarCloud
- GitHub Workflow:
     * Added helm publishing to workflow
     * Added Docker publish workflow
     * Added ability to specify checkout reference in workflow

- Fix Javadoc build warnings

- Updated controller README
- Removed duplicity at configuration files
- Deprecated lighty-codecs artifact
- Introduced lighty-codecs-util
- Used repackaged-akka artifact instead of akka dependencies from odlparent artifact

name: Lighty.io 11.2.0 release
body: This is a maintenance release, updating upstream dependencies to Sodium SR2.

name: Lighty.io 10.3.1 release
body:
This is a maintenance release, updating upstream dependencies as follows:
- odlparent 4.0.15
- mdsal 3.0.16
- yangtools 2.1.18

This improves performance and correctness beyond what upstream provides in the last service release for Neon release stream.

name: Lighty.io 10.3.0 release
body: This is a maintenance release, updating upstream dependencies to Neon SR3.

name: Lighty.io 8.4.2 release
body: This is a maintenance release, cutting non-Central dependencies.

name: Lighty.io 11.1.0 release
body: This is a maintenance release, updating upstream dependencies to Sodium SR1.

name: Lighty.io 10.2.0 release
body: This is an update release, picking up upstream's Neon SR2 release.

name: Lighty.io 9.3.2 release
body: This is a maintenance release, backporting a fix to ModuleId around missing revisions.

name: Lighty.io 9.2.2 release
body: This is a maintenance release, backporting a fix to ModuleId around missing revisions.

name: Lighty.io 9.3.1 release
body:
This is an update to Fluorine SR3-based artifacts to include post-release improvements:
- upgrade of Bouncy Castle to 1.62
- fix to https://jira.opendaylight.org/browse/YANGTOOLS-1004

name: Lighty.io 9.3.0 release
body: This release updates OpenDaylight baseline artifacts to the Fluorine SR3 release.

name: Lighty.io 9.2.1 release
body: This is an bugfix and feature update to the Fluorine SR2-based train. It adds OpenFlowPlugin and OVSDB plugin support.

name: Lighty.io 10.1.0 release
body: This release updates the baseline OpenDaylight artifacts to Neon SR1 versions.

name: Lighty.io 10.0.0 release
body: This is the initial release based on OpenDaylight Neon artifacts.

name: Lighty.io 9.2.0 release
body:
This is the start of the 9.2.x release train, bringing in OpenDaylight Fluorine SR2 components.
A new module, lighty-swagger is also introduced.

name: Lighty.io 9.1.2 release
body:
This release is the second Central-published release, using OpenDaylight Fluorine SR1 as the baseline dependencies.
The largest changes are in terms of project organization, which is revamped for supportability and ease of consumption.

name: Lighty.io 8.4.1 release
body:
This release is the first Central-published release, using OpenDaylight Oxygen SR4 as the baseline dependencies.
The largest changes are in terms of project organization, which is revamped for supportability and ease of consumption.

name: lighty.io 8.4.0 release
body: This lighty.io release is compatible with OpenDaylight Oxygen SR4.

name: lighty.io 9.1.1 release
body: This lighty.io release is compatible with OpenDaylight Fluorine SR1.

name: lighty.io 9.0.1 release
body: This lighty.io release is compatible with OpenDaylight Fluorine.

name: lighty.io 8.3.0 release
body: This lighty.io release is compatible with OpenDaylight Oxygen SR3.

name: lighty.io 8.2.0 release
body: This lighty.io release is compatible with OpenDaylight Oxygen SR2.
